content: संक्रांत {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Passed through or into, entered into. {@--2@} Transferred; devolved, entrusted; पुत्रसंक्रांतलक्ष्मीकैर्यद्वृद्धेक्ष्वाकुभिर्धृतं <ls>U. 1. 22.</ls> {@--3@} Seized, affected. {@--4@} Reflected, imaged. {@--5@} Depicted. {@--6@} Having Saṃkrānti (in <ab>astr.</ab>). --तं Property got by a woman from her husband.
